name: properties_get_hotel_photos_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hotels.
Tool description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travelling site/application, such as : hotels.com
API description: This function fetches all available photos for a given hotel property using the specified RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The value of id field that received from .../properties/list endpoint
